channel.title: Static-Website on Dev Blog - Exploring Winnipeg Parks
channel.description: Recent content in Static-Website on Dev Blog - Exploring Winnipeg Parks

item.title: Exploring Winnipeg Parks - Dev Blog for a Photography and Community Website
item.description: Welcome! For the past few years, I’ve been building up a website featuring my photos of parks, community centres, and other landmarks throughout my home town of Winnipeg. I started this personal project about a year-and-a-half into the Covid lockdown period, in large part as a way to get myself outdoors and staying active. Since then, I’ve visited enough parks throughout the city to post well over 100 photo galleries, with many more in the queue!
